title: Neck Rolls
instructions: Gently roll your neck in a circular motion. 30 seconds clockwise, 30 seconds counter-clockwise.

title: Wrist Flexor Stretch
instructions: Extend your arm with palm facing up. Use the other hand to gently pull fingers back towards you.

title: Seated Spine Twist
instructions: Sit tall. Twist your torso to the right, holding the chair back. Hold for 30s, then switch sides.

title: Eye Palming
instructions: Rub palms together to generate heat. Cup them over closed eyes without pressing. Breathe deeply.

title: Shoulder Shrugs
instructions: Lift shoulders towards ears, hold for 3 seconds, then release. Repeat.
